origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'GreenInvestmentAPI.evaluate_impact', 'description': 'This function evaluates the impact of green finance policies on specific sectors, such as renewable energy.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of policy, e.g., green_finance.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year of the policy evaluation.'}, {'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The specific sector affected, e.g., renewable_energy.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'evaluation', 'description': 'The evaluation results of the policy impact on the specified sector.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 GreenInvestmentAPI.evaluate_impact, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'green_finance', 'year'是'2024', 'sector'是'renewable_energy'.
